ygData.subject: RE: Need info again
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure if I can log in at 9pm.  May have a RL to go.  Ya know, it is the mid- autumn thing mah.  Anyway, will try to catch u.  If possible, pls reserve a
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure if I can log in at 9pm. May have a RL to go. Ya know, it is the mid-
autumn thing mah. Anyway, will try to catch u. If possible, pls reserve a spot for me.
Hee heee.

On Thu, 23 Sep 1999 09:11:04 +0800, LKW wrote:

>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Garren also got his at 630, but I camped 2 times till morning 8-10am and no
>boots dropped. Fri I'm unable to apply leave as I have heavy work
>schedule. Now that my friend allow me to use his ISP until the end of this
>month, I can pay less per hr ($0.42/hr instead of $3/hr). I intend to camp
>15 hrs on Fri night till Sat morning if u can, instead of Thurs. FF u
>better wait for me ah, or u solo sure got cursed. Remember we are the
>cursed brothers, must work in pair (cursed+cursed=blessed then can work).
> So, wanna change ya camping to Fri night? Fri I also have family dinner,
>probably can only login at 9pm, and camp to Sat 12 noon (15 hrs). Reply if
>you can camp on Fri instead of Thurs, thx.
>
>Ziltus
>
>On Wednesday, 22 September, 1999 10:06 PM, Tommy Fong
>[SMTP:tommyfong@...] wrote:
>> From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
>>
>> Since u and me are both cursed, I think we can try to camp again
>together to get the
>> cursed + cursed = blessed thing.... ;) Anyway, I am planning to do it
>AGAIN for this
>> Thursday since I'm off work on Friday. Hah... Interested? Oh... for the
>spawn time,
>> someone said 3am to
>> 6am is the highest drop time. Yipe... last time when I was camped with
>Cairn, he got
>> his at 630 right after I left........ so?? WHY THE EQ GOD HATES ME SO
>MUCH!
>>
>> On Wed, 22 Sep 1999 10:58:53 +0800, LKW wrote:
>>
>> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >
>> >Kow, 200HP, 1 nuke can settle liao, hehe.
>> >
>> >I tried to camp Jboot few times, the longest is 11 hrs (no drop in 11hrs
>at
>> >all, I #1 in the Q) amd 13 hrs (drop 3 in 1st 5 hrs and nothing in the
>next
>> >8 hrs when I become #1 in Q). Dunno I'm cursed or wat ;( Any tips what
>> >time jboot will spawn at S'pore time (I heard pple say some items only
>drop
>> >at specific time)? As for anti-camp, GM ever show up in Derz room
>saying
>> >there IS anti-camp code in room, but I myself see someone got jboot
>liao,
>> >stay behind help their friend to get jboot - 2 jboots still spawn even
>they
>> >just stand at Derz's throne. ;(
>> >
>> >As for runed circlet, I waiting for flat chest and FF to go along with
>me.
>> > They both 34 now, shld lvl very soon ;) *hint hint*. I ever see a
>warrior
>> >solo camp for circlet but I quite scare of triggering train in that
>room.
>> > Once I oom and kena crowd of goblins whacking me, I'm as good as dead
>> >meat.
>> >
>> >Ziltus.
>> >
>> >On Wednesday, 22 September, 1999 10:29 AM, Lim choong Ee
>> >[SMTP:choongee@...] wrote:
>> >> From: Lim choong Ee <choongee@...>
>> >>
>> >> ancient croc is definately less then 200 hp so no worry on soloing
>> >> only problem is he hit hard in the 50dmg.
>> >> if the place holder spawn which is a smaller version of croc
>> >> u had to kill them, they r much easier, u can pull them
>> >> to the water edge without any trouble from the other at all
>> >> at 35, it's a very easy place to hold unless the ancient croc
>> >> cast the DD spell on u call PL.
>> >> and one thing, at 35 n u still had no jboot :p
>> >> u better go camp the boot first before u do anything esle.
>> >> u r still wearing servant cap.....get2 more your level go to
>> >> camp the preacher n get the ruin circlet, it's pretty easy to camp
>> >> if u had 2 more buddy your level.
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>
>> >> At 09:31 AM 9/22/99 +0800, you wrote:
>> >> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >> >
>> >> >Hmm...what is the lvl of the 3 croc that I must kill b4 ancient croc

>> >kena

>ancient
>> >> >croc, is there any goodies dropped in lower guk (beside shimmering
>orb,
>> >> >undead protection collar, woven glass bracer, midnight mallet)?

>greaves
>> >> >from
>> >> >> it =)
>> >> >> 3. Gatorscale Leggings on the same Ancient Crocodile 3/4 chance of
>> >> >dropping
>> >> >> it
>> >> >>
>> >> >> Tae Ew Templar is 20 min spawn, but usually there is something else
>as
>> >> >> placeholder.
>> >> >> Ancient Crocodile is 2hr-6hr spawn, but you have to clear the 3
>> >> >crocodiles
>> >> >> there to make it spawn
>> >> >>
>> >> >> P.s Prexus server has killed Lord Nagafen. )
